column4: hi can you help? i need to make gimp pressure sensitive on my hp tablet (tx2530ea).  Does anyone know how?
last time i messed with a tablet. i had to configure that in the gimp settings somewhere. (2 yrs ago)
load gimp.. look in its settings.. play with them till it works.
thers been so many changes to gimp and how X handles input devices in the last few years..   it would take me time to figure it out.
